short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extensions tracks all your spendings

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension helps to manage your spending's, it notifies you when you have reached the limit amount set up by you for the day,thereby  helping you save more money.
